title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content: nts - but enemies were fair game. We told Astarion he could only feed on animals - intelligent creatures are off-limits. We learned that Astarion might be a vampire! A monster hunter named Gandrel is looking for him. We fought a monster hunter who was looking for Astarion. Astarion killed a monster hunter who had been looking for him. Astarion suspects that the parasite may have negated some of the downsides of being a vampire spawn. Perhaps his master has no power over him anymore. We learned t
